backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with mixins for authorization and blob storage, plus extensive types for US geography, proposals, user profiles, and internal data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports describing two frontend modifications with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including docs, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document defining Whisper’s vision, installation model, canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Spec describes backend storage of complaint categories in stable memory for AI Secretary suggestion logic.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Provides deployment instructions for Whisper on ICP including prerequisites, configuration, and workflows.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Details homepage redesign requirements including permanent hero text, image assets, contrast fixes, and UI rules.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines the multi‑phase Whisper development plan from architectural foundation to multi‑installation support.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Explains the Secretary navigation registry system for registering and routing to frontend destinations.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Manual smoke test covering proposal creation, admin approval, issue project flow, task management, and regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Regression-focused QA checklist validating logo rendering, hover colors, profile flows, navigation, and base-path safety.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Design guidelines defining Whisper’s visual principles, color system, typography, and accessibility rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app and loading the draft-preview blocker and main script.
frontend/public/caffeine-draft-preview-b: Script that detects Caffeine draft environments and blocks injected editor scripts to prevent load errors.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: Teal circular Whisper logo SVG with stylized white shapes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling client-side routing and rendering lazy-loaded pages with a hero home view.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI, logs detailed errors, and handles reload/reset behavior.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Responsive header with logo, navigation, admin link handling, mobile menu, and login integration using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Styled circular icon wrapper supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Reusable spinner with optional label and size options.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: User dropdown showing avatar, profile navigation, and logout behavior with profile fetching.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form card for creating an instance with auto‑generated names, geographic selection, validation, and proposal submission.
County dropdown that loads counties for a selected state with loading and error states.
Place dropdown that loads places for a selected county with loading and error handling.
State selector that loads all states and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing issue project details with overview and tasks tabs, using proposal data and category lookup.
Tasks tab allowing creation, listing, and status toggling of tasks for a proposal via task hooks.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog displaying proposal details with live data fetching and optional auto-opening of the issue project view.
Section listing all proposals with loading states, refresh controls, and navigation-triggered detail dialog opening.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Dismissible nudge card prompting users to open the Secretary feature.
Typeahead search component filtering and selecting location options with keyboard navigation.
Main interactive Secretary chat widget managing discovery and issue-reporting flows with geography lookups and instance checks.
Renders the SecretaryWidget into a DOM portal targeting an overlay container.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountDeletion.ts: Provides mutations for users to request account deletion and for admins to process those requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries on changes.
Fetches and saves the current user's profile using identity-scoped query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint suggestions and all complaint categories based on geography level via backend APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance-name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the current SPA route path and updates on browser navigation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a value over a delay to limit rapid updates such as while typing.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Mutation to delete a proposal and refresh related moderation and proposal data.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Mutation to hide a proposal and invalidate affected moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity and login state.
Implements React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating project tasks via a backend actor. Includes optimistic updates and cache invalidation logic.
A small React hook that syncs state with localStorage with SSR safety. Reads and writes JSON values while handling errors gracefully.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches and maps backend moderation queue proposals into a UI-friendly moderation item list. Handles loading states tied to actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Loads an image URL and tracks ready/error state, resetting when the source changes. Uses an Image object and synchronous load fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for checking parent relationships, fetching proposals, retrieving single proposal details, and checking admin status. Integrates authentication and actor readiness into query enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryAutoCreat: Mutation hook that auto-creates a Whisper instance proposal based on geographic selection and canonical naming. Computes metadata, submits a proposal, handles failures, and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Simple stateful hook for a secretary chat UI, managing message history and menu visibility. Supports adding messages and resetting or returning to the menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryGeography: Provides React Query hooks for secretary endpoints to fetch states, counties, cities, top issues, and city search results by hierarchical IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryInstanceA: Checks availability of Whisper instances for given geography levels and aggregates multi-level availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Implements a registry for navigation destinations with register, unregister, lookup, and keyword search capabilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Stores and retrieves temporary issue project categories in localStorage and invalidates related queries on update.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Updates proposal status via backend and invalidates proposal and moderation queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: Contains hooks to fetch states, counties, and places from the backend with graceful handling of empty results.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables, dark mode styles, layout utilities, and visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Provides helpers to format geography labels, population, and proposal geography metadata into display-friendly strings.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryFriendlyMessag: Builds friendly Assistant messages based on geography, instance existence, and top issues, plus helpers for founding/instance-found text.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines Secretary navigation options with keyword matching and deep-link creation/parsing utilities.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralizes all user-facing UI text for consistent messaging and easy localization.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, and normalizes Whisper instance names and computes canonical names based on geography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDeletionRe: Admin interface to view and process account deletion requests with authentication, authorization, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin moderation page handling authentication, admin access checks, and displaying moderation items with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Displays a table of moderation items with status badges, category icons, and confirmation dialogs for approve/reject/hide/delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Renders a geography placeholder page with navigation back to home and UI copy integration.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileEditPa: Profile editing page supporting backend fields, local-only fields, image upload/preview, deletion requests, and saving profile changes.
frontend/src/pages/profile/profileLocalS: Local storage helpers for storing and retrieving profile fields not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileViewPa: Profile display page showing user info, image, local-only fields, and navigation to edit mode.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the profile page.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Utility resolving asset paths safely relative to the app's base URL.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Provides event-based navigation for directing the secretary flow to specific project pages.
frontend/src/utils/spaNavigate.ts: Simple SPA navigation helper using pushState and popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash routes), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or session.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into normalized user-friendly messages with special handling for moderation and runtime issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and theme settings for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing efforts to prevent Caffeine preview crashes by blocking injected draft-editor scripts and removing related dependencies.
